content: I've actually started using a cloud-based backup service to store my important files, so I don't have to worry about losing data in case my computer crashes. It's given me a lot of peace of mind, especially since I've been upgrading my devices and systems lately. Speaking of which, I've been thinking about upgrading my desktop computer's RAM for ages, and I finally took the plunge last month. The new RAM has significantly improved the computer's performance, and I can now run multiple resource-intensive programs simultaneously without any lag.
